version_description:
- Fixes for problems with downloading library updates
- Browse all commentaries through the main library menus
- Always use secure connections when connecting to the Internet
- Smoother scrolling experience and additional bug fixes

- View alternate text versions from the commentary panel.
- Information about each book
- Parsha and Aliya headers. Aliya headers can be turned on the text settings
- Bug fixes

- Fix versions not in English
- Add donate button

- Autocomplete search results
- Save texts using the star icon

- Download only part of the library from settings menu
- Better copy & paste
- Share feature
- Report errors
- Fixed issue with copying and sharing

- More daily calendars including 929, Mishna Yomit and Rambam Yomi
- Faster search
- Better user experience while scrolling
Bug fixes, and a Purim Surprise

- Sefaria's public source sheets now show up in search results.
- Other bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Differentiate Israeli and Diaspora parsha
Deep Linking - clicking on a Sefaria link will open the app

Source sheets arranged by topic categories.
Additional bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements

- **Sign in**
- Sign in to your account
- Sync history / saved texts / settings between sefaria.org and app
- View personal sheets in app
- More detailed history
- Save sheets
- Change interface language of app from settings page
- Bug fixes
- Going to books with an error no longer crashes the app
- Don't turn off sound of background apps
Fix Daf Yomi issue

Bug fixes
- Fix some offline books which were crashing
- Load books on offline mode by default
- Fix version information in connections panel
- Use Hebrew titles for Hebrew app language

Bug Fixes:
- Fix jump that can happen when scrolling
- Prevent app from crashing when offline
- Prevent some books from not opening when offline

Add new calendars
Choose Ashkenaz or Sephardi Haftorah
Fix bugs relating to bugs not opening both online and offline
Dedication page
Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Open a search result faster
See version information on search results
Fix issue with versions on Genesis

Fix issue with versions not displaying
Fix app crashing every so often

Fix issue with saving last book read
Fix issue with saving texts
On phones without a browser, Sefaria no longer acts as a browser

- Text selection: you can now select text by long pressing on a paragraph.
- Dictionary definitions: Tap "Define" in the context menu when you select text to define the word

Reworked the way the app handles downloads. Downloads are much faster and the app will request missing files should any be missing.
View source sheets in the connections panel
Paragraph numbers are now on for Talmud
Fixed issue with certain links to sefaria.org mistakenly opening in the app
Better error management and logging.

Move "Copy" and "Share" back to long-press menu on paragraph
Topics work in autocomplete
Faster autocomplete experience
Change Versions to Translations

Bug fixes
- Fix back button crashing app
- Fix Share button not working

Bug fixes
- Fix scroll to previous chapter
- Fix issue with commentator titles in resources panel
- Extend Halacha Yomit calendar
Fix issue where not all commentary displayed in resources panel
Fix bug that prevented certain links from displaying
Don't show download error on startup
Bug fix for opening app with certain Sefaria URLs

- Fix offline library download errors for certain phones
- Add button to reload connections if they fail to load

Fix issue with bilingual text not displaying in correct order
Fix bug for some sefaria URLs that wouldn't open properly with app

Topics
- Browse thousands of topics by category
- View top source and source sheets for topics
- See topics in the resources panel for the current text you're reading
- Search for topics
Bug fixes
- Keyboard no longer blocking input boxes on login page

Bug fixes
- Fix issue that commentaries wouldn't show when offline
- Fix issue that app wouldn't save last place
- Fix issue loading dictionaries from the table of contents
- Make link loading more reliable
- Fix issue generating gematria above 899
Fix issue with status bar color
